name: Cave Escape (itch) (Flash)
description:
Submission for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022
Theme: Death is only the beginning

Link to GitHub Repository:

https://github.com/Flash526/GDTV-GameJam-2022

Playtime: ~5 to 10 minutes

Your goal is to reach the end of the cave! In order to do this, you must play as 3 different characters in order to set yourself up to escape. Each time you die, you spawn as the next character.

  •     The Robot has boots that allow them to double jump
  •     The Fairy has wings that allow them to glide by holding jump
  •     The Hero is the only one that can open the exit and escape

Controls for Keyboard:
Move with A and D, Jump with Space, Interact with E, Reset the level with R

This was my first ever attempt at making a game for a game jam, and also my first ever game uploaded to itch. It's a pretty short game, and I never got around to adding sound or music but I still had fun with this project regardless!
